name: Let's Date Cas Asa!
description:
Ever wanted to date real-life person Cas Asa?  No?  Well, here's this game anyway.

Created as a test of Ren'Py's coding and customization!  I would say it was a success simply because I learned that I love coding in Ren'Py.  The game itself should only take about 7 minutes to play through.
